FIELD.NAME: CONTENT-VERSION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Version Number for this message content description

FIELD.NAME: MSG-ID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Unique ID used by the requestor or publisher to distinguish the message

FIELD.NAME: START-TIME
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Requested start time for the scope of the product to cover.

FIELD.NAME: STOP-TIME
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Requested stop time for the scope of the product to cover.

FIELD.NAME: REQ-STRING
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Specific to the product provider. The string will define a database query, a script expression, Directive string, or some other keyword syntax made known by the provider.

FIELD.NAME: NUM-OF-INPUT-FILES
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Indicates the number of files included in this request message.

FIELD.NAME: ARRAY-START
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Control field indicating the start of an array of object fields

FIELD.NAME: INPUT-FILE.n.URI
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: URI specifying the location where the input file is located

FIELD.NAME: INPUT-FILE.n.NAME-PATTERN
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Describes the file name

FIELD.NAME: INPUT-FILE.n.DESCRIPTION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Description of the file in text or xml

FIELD.NAME: INPUT-FILE.n.FORMAT
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Describes the file format.

FIELD.NAME: INPUT-FILE.n.VERSION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Identifies the version ID of the file

FIELD.NAME: INPUT-FILE.n.SIZE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Size of the included file

FIELD.NAME: INPUT-FILE.n.DATA
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The file content

FIELD.NAME: ARRAY-END
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Control field indicating the end of an array of object fields

FIELD.NAME: PROD-NAME
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Name of the product

FIELD.NAME: PROD-DESCRIPTION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Description of the product in text or xml

FIELD.NAME: PROD-TYPE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Product type being requested. See Table 4-29. Product Categories

FIELD.NAME: PROD-SUBTYPE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Product subtype being requested. See Table 4-29. Product Categories

FIELD.NAME: NUM-OF-PROD-SUBTYPES
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Number of further delineations / categories beyond the product subtype. Also, used as msg subject elements ME5, ME6, etc. in Product Message.

FIELD.NAME: ARRAY-START
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Control field indicating the start of an array of object fields

FIELD.NAME: PROD-SUBTYPE.n.NAME
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: First subcategory of the product subtype. (Subject elements ME5, ME6, etc. of the Product Message)

FIELD.NAME: ARRAY-END
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Control field indicating the end of an array of object fields

FIELD.NAME: RESPOND-VIA-MSG
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Indicates the message to use to deliver the product.

FIELD.NAME: DELIVER-VIA-REFERENCE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Indicates if the product will be referenced by a URI in the message specified above.

FIELD.NAME: DELIVER-VIA-INCLUDE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Indicates if the product is to be included in the message specified above.

FIELD.NAME: URI
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Location where the requesting component is asking for the product file(s) to be stored. Could be a web address, directory or folder specification

FIELD.NAME: NAME-PATTERN
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Describes the file name

FIELD.NAME: FORMAT
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Describes the file format

FIELD.NAME: VERSION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Identifies the version ID of the file

FIELD.NAME: SIZE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Maximum size of the file acceptable to the requester. Size specified in KB.
